caption: The best! Delicious food and large portions. Don't order your food spicy unless you really want it spicy! They mean it!

I cannot recommend Pho’s Spicier Thai enough. It’s my top favorite takeout option in Chicago right now. They have quick, excellent service (although to be honest we usually do pickup, which is very efficient and COVID safe.)  I have never been disappointed with the food quality- it’s always hot, reflects the spice level I ordered, and tastes wonderful. Be warned- spice is pretty high here, so if you order food and you worry about spice, I recommend ordering it COMPLETELY WITHOUT spice. (Usually when you order by phone, they ask if you’ve eaten there before so you’re aware of the spice level. Also...it literally has “spicier” in the name.)  My go-to is the pad see ew- full of vegetables AND meat, a really hearty portion, and at unbeatable prices. This is a place that has the best price-to-quality ratio that is clearly catering to customer loyalty- and it works. I have also had their pad prik and musman curry- both of which are equally as good as the pad see ew. They also have great appetizers and appetizer deals. Order here and I promise it’ll become your staple Thai takeout!

Extremely spicy for my taste. Even though I ordered the lowest level of spiciness I couldn't finish my meal because the fire in throat and stomach was too hard to handle. Also, instead of tofu I got chicken in my pinapple fried rice, and for me as a vegeterian, this is a huge mistake.
Very tasty food, and it's affordable as well!  Caution: food can be very spicy.  Some of you might not be able to handle the spiciness!
Go to Thai place.no matter how far we are
Love this place
thai food at this place - super good.

I tried to order food via the website. The promotion they listed for ordering on the website was not applied, and they canceled my order and said they did not deliver to my address. I had ordered delivery to my apartment before though and was then able to get delivery via postmates. There was a duplicate order issue and I wanted their help with cancellation. They said that they had stopped making my food but that they couldn’t cancel my order, so I was still charged!
Every dish we ordered was great!!!
thai food and the atmosphere at this location is super good. This location is one of my favorites. The place has an awesome atmosphere.
Delicious and Spicy
Ordered on Uber eats on a Whim.     Food was good, except for the upset stomach later.     Maybe a fluke, maybe not.
Used to be good.... But over the past 6 months has gone downhill. Bland and boring Pad Thai
Would definitely recommend trying this spot. Fantastic atmosphere, delicious dishes, fantastic service. Highly recommended.
Arrived quickly and was still hot. Very good, very spicy! They don’t play on their spice levels. Can’t wait to order again.
Just finished my iced tea. There is a bug at the bottom.
Very tasty food, highly recommend the pineapple-cashew fried rice!
Best around. Makes Spoon Thai taste like dog food.

I finally found a Thai restaurant in the city that actually makes my order truly spicy! I ordered the Pad Thai “Hot” and it is extremely hot. I might even go a level down next time. Great flavor, it’s my new favorite Thai restaurant in Chicago and I will be back for sure.
By far, the best Pad Thai and Shrimp Shumai I've had since I was studying abroad in Thailand! I highly recommend to anyone who wants a generous portion of food with excellent taste!
Waited for hour and a half.  Order never showed
I love the food however, the lady on the phone is quite racist. Such a shame to see people still having prejudice towards other races! I will not be ordering here again.

I love this restaurant! They serve superb dishes, their menu is rich, The chef in that restaurant is an expert, I love very much eating all their food. The food is consistently tasty, the attitude towards the clients  is helpful. I often go to  this restaurant and I not even once was discontended. I recommend it to all my friends.

Extremely terrible :(. The soup don’t even look good nor cook. It’s like they used the broth and Tom yum paste to make the soup. Definitely not recommend for anyone to come here especially if you want fresh and good foods. Terrible service as well.
I like this place a lot. theres a happy air. The food is good. the service is efficient and the team is well trained. The price is honest. I warmly recommend.
Good food but poor customer service.
This spot never disappoints. They serve fresh dishes for fair rates, there are no long waits even when the spot is busy.
I love the Pad Thai and Lad Nar. Delicious!

The food is not what it should be. I understand that every restaurant has a different style of cooking a certain dish, but I am extremelydispleased. I've ordered from there multiple times for different items and all were not quite authentic Thai food. I'm done!
Awful service.  Do NOT go

Called 4 times and no answer. Went to the actual restaurant and called while inside. The phone rang and rang. I walked out. Bad customer service. Spend your money on businesses that care. Called yesterday evening, Oct 27 at 7:09, 7:11, 7:15, and 7:25. My number ends in 4598
This place simply knows how to take care of their clients. Always with a very nice demeanor. The food is reasonably priced, regularly delicious and neat.

Pho's Spicier Thai is amazing if you're a spicy food lover! I always get the extra hot and it's always amazing in any of their dishes!  They are also very vegan & vegetarian friendly and I have had zero problems with any of the food I've gotten from them.

At first I thought the food was amazing (I always order Pad Thai). However, they have terrible customer service. If you plan on eating their food please consider ordering take out. The waiter was super disrespectful to me and my friend the first time we were there. After that time, we came back about 2-3 more times to give them another “try” but the service got worse. The most recent time we went was about 2 weeks ago, and the waiter served us water in PLASTIC cups (yes, you read that right) while everyone else got glass cups. What the heck?! My friend also found a live black bug in the Pad Thai YUCK. I couldn’t continue eating after that. It’s hard for me to think that we were treated this way bc we are POC & minorities, but MAN they suck. Do NOT go to place expecting good service. Very disappointed bc I thought the food was good but after we found the bug, we will not be coming back again.
Best place to get the spiciest tasty food
Great food and price. Good for people that love spicy, and you can choose your heat level (for those less ambitious)
I've ordered from here on multiple occasions. Never dissatisfied, they get the order correct even with modifications. The musman curry is to die for and the portions are huge .
They’re right. It’s spicy.

Worst restaurant I’ve ever experienced. It such a shame the discrimination this restaurant has against black people. If you are around the North park university don’t order from these people !!! Ever !!!

I like spicy food, but my partner can’t eat spicy food. On Postmates this is simply named Pho’s Thai Cuisine, there is no Spicier in the title on Postmates so we figured it would be a normal spice level. I decided to give it a try for delivery and specified that I needed my partner’s food to be mild. It was very spicy and she was unable to eat it. When we called them they insisted that we wanted it to be spicy, despite the fact that my receipt said “mild.” I could have understood if they just misread the order, but the woman on the phone was rude and insisted that we wanted it to be very spicy. We will not be back to a place that is so rude and unhelpful to customers.

I would love the opportunity to rate this restaurant a cool 5 STARS! HOWEVER, they refused to answer my call 5 minutes before the end of lunch (I needed 5 lunch items). When my call WAS answered, it was a voicemail with no pre-recorded message. At 3:00, an actual human lady answered and refused to accept my lunch menu orders...even after explaining their phone hell. What she didn't know is that I review LOTS of restaurants and wanted to give my neighborhood Thai place a good word. Ahhh...well!
Panang curry and pineapple fried rice are delish. Fast delivery. They charge extra for sauces.
It was okay

Be careful!!!! The medium is already extremely spicy. I ordered green curry which looked orange /red because there was so much pepper in there. I like spicy food but this is a bit much...stick to mild+ if you like heat. Fast delivery as well.
We always order off Grubhub! Food is always accurate and comes warm. The quality of the food is amazing! One of of favorite places to order and some of the best Thai around
Food is good, not great. Prices are low.
We ordered the spicy chicken salad and found raw chicken and it was already rubbery to begin with....good luck
(Translated by Google) Thai food in Chicago Taste available.  (Original) อาหารไทยในชิคาโก รสชาติใช้ได้ครับ
Relatively, reasonably priced. The pad khee mao shrimp was delicious as is the penang curry

We ordered pad Thai, one with chicken, one with tofu, and requested mild+, which is the least spicy option. I am not sensitive to spice and usually enjoy it quite a bit, but this was so spicy it was inedible. You couldn’t taste anything but spice. Very disappointing.
Go to Thai food in the neighborhood. Know your spice level.
Really good stuff!
Good and spicy
Amazing bowl of beef pho, be careful of ordering anything with spice, even their medium is hot for a seasoned spice lover

Delivers on Spice  I have only experienced delivery from Pho's, and the experience has always been positive.  Personal favorites include; the fried vegetable gyoza, which always arrive perfectly golden brown and crispy, and the chicken pad Thai. The portion is very generous, and the noodles and chicken are perfectly prepared. I have learned that the mild peanut sauce still has a fair amount of spice to it, but not overwhelmingly so. The mild plus is also delicious, but a bit too much for me.  I have also tried the spring rolls, which were crisp and refreshing, and accompanied by a sweet tamarind sauce. Another dish that I have sampled quite a few times is the yellow curry, with tofu. The curry sauce is tasty, and packs serious heat.  Additionally, I suggest trying the Thai iced tea, which pairs nicely with many of these dishes.
It's a well appointed place to enjoy some Thai.  It was a great place to relax and enjoy some friendly service! This will leave you with a full and happy.

BYOB. Date venue with excellent food, service, portion and equal mixture of ingredients. SPICE/HOT/CHILI is King here!  I can only handle MILD, as MILD+ was too much.  Chicken LHAD NHA was perfect in every way with the most delicious gravy!
Try the pad Thai chicken and pad kha mao
I am a student at nearby loyola university. My colleagues and I are regulars here and are always satisfied. This is an amazing restaurant and my mouth is watering just typing this.

Awesome spicy food! I had Pas Thai and it was amazing! The city was awesome with rice too! I have to say, they’re one of few restaurants I’ve ever been with extra clean silverware and glasses! Excellent job!

Amazing thai food. That's it. In my opinion it's better than opart thai right next door. They just opened a new location as they deserve to be doing. If I had to guess all the one star reviews are people who prioritize "no miscommunication during the process" over the quality of the food.
They don't follow directions if you tell them no egg. Doesn't matter if it's over the phone or in the app. If you have an egg sensitivity, just do not order from here period.
Enjoyed the food!!
Good Thai food

Went for a pick up. And there was a woman and man behind the counter working and the woman was sitting and eating. She looked me up and down then looked at the guy and told him to check my ID if i don’t pay cash in her language. She told him multiple times and he said it was a company card he had to show her my name wasn’t on it for her to stop saying check my ID. It’s EXTREMELY unprofessional as hell to be eating right where you’re serving customers and think because you’re speaking a different language you can talk badly about your customers. Be care about who you talk about. This is America, so many people know so many languages. You never know who knows what.

Sooooo gooooood! Beware! Extra spicy is actually so spicy that i was barely able to eat any of it at all. But the flavors were truly great. I love thai food and this is one of my favorite in Chicago. The beef salad is a mist try. And so are the basil noodles. Thai iced tea is great too.
It's 9:58 pm and their website says they're open until 12 am, I walk in and they tell me they only accept carryout orders from here on. I wanted to sit and eat, not carryout. Won't be coming back!
Curries are delicious. Lunch specials are where it's at. Even the vegetable soup that comes with the lunch special is amazing, and I wasn't sure what to expect
Great eats and good prices!  Also, BYOB.  Solid joint with fast service.
I thought it was pretty good the first time i ordered. Lately, they give me too little sauce.
Great lunch menu for weekdays.  Excellent value.
The best pad Thai in Chicago!!

The best spicy Thai food I have ever had. I usually like my food as spicy as i can get it, but the waitress wisley warned me off of that this time. I ordered two levels below the maximum spice, and it was still CRAZY HOT! but not just burning kill you hot, it also had some amazing flavor to it.
What? You said 4.9! What? Do u know about msg? Do u know about sodium? Gosh......awful...disgusting place. Sad!
It's nice quiet place but good food.I really like panang curry! but be careful! Medium It's a quite hot!!

Only place we go for Thai food in Lincoln Square.  My wife and I found them on a walk and now it's a MUST EAT for us. Everything is great - particularly the panang curry. Be wary though - the "spicier" in their name is accurate.
It's hard to find good papaya salad. This was great. Really fresh and perfectly spiced.
Ordered pad Thai on the phone for pickup. Price was reasonable, food was delicious. Parking can be a bit tight at times. $3 delivery surcharge. I will definitely come back here!
Great value and tasty food! Big bowl of noodles and soup with veggies for just $7
Oh wow . I tried this place because I was sick and in the mood for a good broth...and wow was i pleased. Amazing soups and the pineapple fried rice is to die for. I found my new spot !

Got delivery recently. I have been living in the city for 6 years now, being raised in an Indian household I grew up on the rich flavors that the Asian contitent has to offer. After a long and arduous search for the best pad thai in the city I can say I have finally found it.  If you want the BEST thai food in Chicago, this is your spot.
